Key Arguments: The legislation is seen as a means for the government to censor and control freedom of speech.
The legislation would impose bans and heavy fines on individuals for spreading information deemed untrue by the government, while the government itself is not subject to the same rules.
Free speech should not be legislated, but rather managed through appropriate codes of practice and consequences after warnings.
The legislation is likened to living under a dictatorship.
Notable Quotes: I believe both the Federal and State governments want to play big brother and completely censor us and shut down Freedom of Speech.
It would be no different to living in a dictatorship if this legislation were to be passed and made into Law.
